items.description: The sinews of the conflict have stretched wider in the last year.

items.title: Exposure to mining fossil fuel linked to ALS, new research finds
items.description: A major pollutant from fossil fuels has been linked to an increased risk of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS), according to new research.

items.title: WATCH:  Hundreds of hikers trapped by blizzard on Mount Everest
items.description: An effort is underway to rescue hundreds of hikers who became trapped on Mount Everest due to an unexpected blizzard.
